title: Education to Strengthen Nurses' Competencies in Responding to Psychological Violence Against Women

context.prior_knowledge: Basic psychology and nursing understanding, foundational knowledge in women’s health
context.additional_context: Education conducted in a VR simulation environment based on real clinical cases.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three concepts, causes, symptoms, and legal procedures related to psychological violence
Learners can apply effective communication techniques with victims of violence with 80% accuracy through VR simulation
Learners can select and implement appropriate reporting procedures and support resources after case analysis
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
